item.description: What a great place for dinner and drinks after outside on the roof...(even dancing if you wish)..We were all impressed,enough to have a meetup here....Rooftop120 is New Englandâ€™s Largest Four Season Rooftop Restaurant and Bar located at 120 Hebron Avenue in Glastonbury. Rooftop 120 is bringing a new and exciting dining + social experience for all crowds to enjoy. Starting with our magnificent four season rooftop, have a seat at the enclosed river rock bar or venture outside onto the sky deck by the fire pit where our mixologists offer a wide variety of drinks, wine and specialty cocktails. Looking for a more unique and fun dining experience? Join us inside our casual fine dining room and lounge, where our guests can choose from our menu of full raw bar, small plates and entrees to share as they enjoy their cocktails and the atmosphere. Rooftop 120 offers live music and entertainment on Thursday, Friday and Saturday evenings. Rooftop120 is an amazing new hot spot for any occasion. Come check us out for happy hour, dinner and dessert or late night fun....http://www.rooftop120.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/17482-Rooftop120_Summer-Menu.pdf
item.how_to_find_us: a warm welcome by chuck 860-729-4504 my email chuckles125@att.net

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford
